intro: The most fun and challenging Clutter yet!
description:
With over 1700 puzzles, this game will keep you playing for days and days.
So many new Clutter variations mixed in with old favorites for a Quest you'll never forget.
The biggest treat though, is the never before seen, fully replayable, Spot The Differences Puzzles.
As just like regular Clutter levels, they are highly  addicting too.
In addition, there are Sliders, Square Jigsaws and Box Quotes.
And the Return of Super-Thin Sliders with Auto-Save!!!
And wait until you see the Number Tile Puzzles.
You've never seen Clutter this fun and challenging.
And as always, the options let you play Clutter the way you want.
And Favorites allow you can collect the puzzles you want to play again and again.

x1 - New Object Sets and Many New Gameplay Modes
x2 - Over 1700 levels and a very challenging 100 level Main Quest
x3 - An extra easy No-Motion Old-School Quest
x4 - The brand new and addicting Spot The Difference Puzzlle
x5 - Hundreds of picture puzzles and 200 new Box Quotes puzzles
x6 - Randomly generated levels mean endless replayability
x7 - Another Great Soundtrack with a Cinematic Feel.
